title: Jody Glittenberg Rural GENESIS Fund
description: To provide travel and internet capable laptop computers to students enrolled in the Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner Program at the University of Colorado.  If $25,000 is received in 5 years, the fund will be invested in a pure endowment.
marketingContent: To provide travel and internet capable laptop computers to students enrolled in the Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner Program at the University of Colorado. If $25,000 is received in 5 years, the fund will be invested in a pure endowment.
